TopicTitle: We need more station parts, modules, habitats, etc. suggestions?

Articles.Content:
I am trying to make a station and I'm having a hard time finding some station parts, the game is really lacking some, even with mods, I've been searching the whole spaceport and forums and only found a few ones that are very good and fitting.

Basically a good module is this:

Compliments with the stock parts, or if not, must have other parts that fit together as a set.

Habitable and has a functioning Crew Hatch

IVA is optional but it would be nice to have some. (that means it must be a command module)

Also some modules that do different things other than providing habitation would be good (roleplaying research or life support)

Any suggestions?
What about the KSPX pack, there is a station part in there. It doesn't have an internal but as the person who worked on it was made a developer the internal is coming soon.

What about the KSPX pack, there is a station part in there. It doesn't have an internal but as the person who worked on it was made a developer the internal is coming soon.

Yup i'm using the parts

I think the issue with station parts is stations are mostly useless except to store fuel/energy. this means they will be primarily made up of storage parts, which the game has tons of already. many mods that aren't specifically station parts, can be used to make space stations. that's why there are soo few station specific parts. figure out what you want out of a space station then look for mods to make it happen.

I think the issue with station parts is stations are mostly useless except to store fuel/energy. this means they will be primarily made up of storage parts, which the game has tons of already. many mods that aren't specifically station parts, can be used to make space stations. that's why there are soo few station specific parts. figure out what you want out of a space station then look for mods to make it happen.

Life support is good, but I don't see any good life support plugins either, or maybe there is, just let me know, its hard to search mods
Not that hard to find actually, just search for 'oxygen' on spaceport and you'll find a bunch of them. Don't know about 'good' though, I haven't tried any yet...
I've been working on some parts, but as I have college, high school, extracurricular work to do, and I am making it by myself, the work is going very slow.

ISS Mod Pack coming out for beta soon

not sure if dev only or public. I do know devs get a trial though. link in my signature.
